name: Outro
_source: speak;Valter;...I've found you, Eirika.|Seems you're as skilled as reports say.|This is going to be fun.|Yes, yes, yes.|I do so love strong women.
speak;Valter;No, we'll pass on dessert for now.|Allow them to escape.|We're leaving.
speak;Klimt;Oh, Prince Innes!|Thank goodness, you're unharmed!
speak;Klimt;Oh, where are my manners?|I am a member of Carcino's Council of Elders.|My name is Klimt.
speak;Innes;So you're one of the traitors who ordered-
speak;Klimt;P-please, please!|I have no intention of opposing you or quarreling with you.|I, too, have been marked for death by Pablo...
speak;Klimt;It's a shameful tale...|Carcino is a nation divided.|As you know, Carcino has no king but is ruled by a council.|But now the council has broken apart into factions mired in discord...
speak;Eirika;Factions...|You're saying that the whole of Carcino has not betrayed Frelia?

speak;Klimt;Correct.|The moderate factions prefer to preserve our alliance with Frelia.|Pablo's faction wishes to endear us to Grado, to surrender us to their armies.|Once Pablo realized he couldn't ply us with brides, he began to have us assassinated.|Those of us who remain have taken refuge underground.|We oppose him where we can.|If you hadn't shown up, I'm not certain I would still be breathing...
speak;Innes;I do recall enemy troops combing this area when I arrived...|They were searching for you, is that it?

speak;Klimt;Pablo has usurped rule of the council.|We had no choice but to hide.|Not all of Carcino's council has gone over to Grado's side, though...|You must believe me-the whole of Carcino does not believe as Pablo does.
speak;Eirika;Lord Klimt...|I understand the hardships you've endured.|I am pleased to hear all of Carcino is not our foe.

speak;Klimt;I will depart at once for Frelia to explain our circumstance to the king.|I think it is best if you return to Frelia as well.|Pablo has considerable wealth, and he commands a vast mercenary force.|I'm sure he'll send more of them this way as soon as he is able.
speak;Gerik;Prince Innes.|Tethys and I are staying with you.|Is that gonna work?

speak;Innes;Yes, I would appreciate the help.|Starting now, you've got a new contract, though-the pay's double.|If the two of you hadn't stayed with me back there, I would not have survived.|Gerik, Tethys...|Thank you. You have my gratitude.
speak;Tethys;Tell me something, Prince.|Did you get...er...hit on the head during that last skirmish?
speak;Innes;...That's unkind.|My neck is not so stiff that I cannot show gratitude.|I would ask for your continued support in the days ahead.
speak;Eirika;We both ask for your help.
speak;Gerik;We've got a deal.|Let's keep each other alive.
speak;Tethys;Ewan!|How is it...|What are you doing here?|I told you to wait in the inn and behave yourself, didn't I?
speak;Ewan;Yeah, but you always run off and disappear.|It's not fair.|I want to have adventures, too.
speak;Tethys;You are such an imp...|I am not out here running about having fun, you know?
speak;Ewan;I know.|That's why I came to see you.|I can help.|My teacher finally got around to teaching me some magic.|Check this out.
speak;Tethys;H-hey!|Knock it off!|You shouldn't be using magic here!
speak;Ewan;Well, I just thought maybe I could help you work is all.|I can protect you now, sis.|Come on, take me with you.|I don't wanna stay in that inn anymore.
speak;Tethys;Oh...all right.|I'll go speak and speak to the Chief and Princess Eirika.|Don't wander off while I'm gone.
speak;Seth;Princess Eirika, Prince Innes.|I think we should follow the advice we've been given and return to Frelia.|Continuing on through Carcino like this is too great a risk to your safety.
speak;Innes;The peril is self-evident.|However, I have to reach Jehanna, and the only way is through Carcino.|If I don't hurry, nations will fall, one after another, to Grado's hunger.
speak;Eirika;Innes is right.|And the road to Rausten leads me through both Carcino and Jehanna.|However, pressing on will only invite more mercenary attacks.
speak;Ewan;Hey, I've got an answer.|I know a way that leads over the mountains straight to Jehanna!|Want me to guide you?
speak;Tethys;Ewan!|Shush!|You know better than to interrupt people when they're talking.|I'm so sorry.|Please let me take my brother out of the way.|Come on, Ewan. Let's go.
speak;Eirika;No, no-wait, please.|Do you really know a route through the mountains?
speak;Ewan;That's what I said.|At the top of that mountain, there's a village named Caer Pelyn.|That's where my teacher lives.|I'm sure he'll lead you through if you ask him nicely.

speak;Innes;Saleh...|I've heard that name on the lips of Frelia's spy network lately.|He's a powerful wielder of magic who has been fighting bandits and monsters.|The spies mentioned something about a Caer Pelyn, if I remember.
speak;Innes;Hm.|If my spies are accurate, this Saleh is someone we can trust.
speak;Eirika;Very well, Ewan.|Will you take us to meet your teacher?
speak;Tethys;Are you sure you can do this, Ewan?
speak;Ewan;Not a problem!|All right, everyone.|See if you can keep up!
